text: Mongolia participated in the 2007 Asian Winter Games, held in Changchun, China from January 28, 2007 to February 4, 2007. ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== Medals as of January 30, 20072007 Winter Asiad medals by NOC ==References== Category:Nations at the 2007 Asian Winter Games Asian Winter Games Category:Mongolia at the Asian Winter Games
title: Mongolia at the 2007 Asian Winter Games
